channel.title: @---------PonderScape---------@
channel.description:
[center]Hello and welcome to PonderScape! Arguably the best old school economy RSPS!
[b]Options:[/b] [img]http://s2.postimage.org/1w9wq8ulg/259ye89.gif[/img] [url=http://www.ponderscape.com/ponderscape_setup.exe]Download Client (recommended)[/url] [img]http://s4.postimage.org/31ieldkkk/webclient.png[/img] [url=http://www.ponderscape.com/webclient.html]Play on the Webclient[/url] [img]http://ponderscape.com/highscores/skill_icon_overall1.gif[/img] [url=http://ponderscape.com/highscores.html]View Highscores[/url] [img]http://s2.postimage.org/1waex5o10/9j41t1.png[/img] [url=http://ponderscape.com]Visit Website[/url]
[b]Staff:[/b] [b]Admins:[/b] Johnny Steven Death [b]Mods:[/b] None! In need! [url=http://ponderscape.com/rules.html]Click here for information...[/url]
[b]Why PonderScape?[/b]
[b]Features:[/b] -Server runs on a dedicated server. -Frequent events by the staff. -Fully functional Pk Store with chaotic weapons and more. -Automated drop parties every so often. Big items dropped. -Fully functional castle wars -Fully functional donator system -Fully functional barrows -Pk Kills, Pk Deaths, Pk KDR, Pk Streak system -Fully functional bounty hunter system -Fully functional HighScores -Easy installer of the downloadable client -Hardly any glitches -Awesome custom items -Two choices of starter packs -Dice command for donators -All skills working -Fully functional Fun Pk (in boxing ring) -Fully functional Grand Exchange -Fully functional clue scrolls -Downloadable client checks for updates -Fully functional bosses -Custom NPCs -MUCH MORE...
[b]Pictures:[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Odlbz4g.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/asd8yxG.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gsPzpkl.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Xi8HIU7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UvUmQxs.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/pg4NEd2.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xiyZflT.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gzoDqcP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VL6y8B6.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/nycbpZY.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vI5j0YX.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6zxehah.png[/img]
[b]Videos:[/b] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rB6NiIaGs-E[/youtube]
[b]Come join us today![/b]
[/center]

item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

I love allstars etc.

This server seems to be made for me.

Read full topic

item.title: @---------PonderScape---------@
item.dc:creator: @tisko1 tisko1
item.description:
@tisko1 wrote:

Looks good if you want to take a break from the more serious servers. Looks like a server you can just log on and have fun. Nice work

Read full topic

item.title: @---------PonderScape---------@
item.dc:creator: @drdre123456 drdre123456
item.description:
@drdre123456 wrote:

[center]Hello and welcome to PonderScape!
Arguably the best old school economy RSPS!

Options:
Download Client (recommended)
Play on the Webclient
View Highscores
Visit Website

Staff:
Admins:
Johnny
Steven
Death
Mods:
None! In need!
Click here for information…

Why PonderScape?

Features:
-Server runs on a dedicated server.
-Frequent events by the staff.
-Fully functional Pk Store with chaotic weapons and more.
-Automated drop parties every so often. Big items dropped.
-Fully functional castle wars
-Fully functional donator system
-Fully functional barrows
-Pk Kills, Pk Deaths, Pk KDR, Pk Streak system
-Fully functional bounty hunter system
-Fully functional HighScores
-Easy installer of the downloadable client
-Hardly any glitches
-Awesome custom items
-Two choices of starter packs
-Dice command for donators
-All skills working
-Fully functional Fun Pk (in boxing ring)
-Fully functional Grand Exchange
-Fully functional clue scrolls
-Downloadable client checks for updates
-Fully functional bosses
-Custom NPCs
-MUCH MORE…

Pictures:











Videos:
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rB6NiIaGs-E[/youtube]

Come join us today!

[/center]
